publishedfiledetails.title: eco's Terrariums
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1][b]MOD ID: 880887081[/b][/h1]

[b]Craft animated Terrariums, Aquariums, and Habitats to decorate your amazing base! [/b]

[h1][b]100% Stackable Mod[/b][/h1]

[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/s8xqghaq1/terrariums_1.png][/img]

[h1]All items can be picked up. (Hold use key to pick up.)
If item is destroyed, after placing, it will return the exact amount of materials used to create it.
Engram cost: 0 
Level needed to learn engram: 1
All items have HP[/h1]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/880887081/133259227522106069/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/69rbtd1mh/terrariums_adminspawn.png[/img][/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/670764308/217691032441409625/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/dpqlf8hmx/terrariums_modinfo.png[/img][/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/880887081/133259956008428596/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/pof4q0ri1/Bug_Reports.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/880887081/1318836262672782146/][img]https://s9.postimg.cc/fd528jszz/FAQs.png[/img][/url]

[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/9glvd398p/terrariums_2.png][/img]

[h1][b]Mod includes:[/b][/h1]

[b]Crafting Container (Animated Fishbowl) with the following:[/b]

Aquarium (Animated)
Dimetrodon Terrarium (Animated)
Frog Terrarium (Animated)
Monkey Habitat (Animated)
Panda Habitat (Animated)
Snake Terrarium (Animated)
Spider Terrarium (Animated)
Squid Aquarium (Animated)
Snow Biome Terrarium (Animated)
Turtle Terrarium (Animated)
Desert Terrarium (Animated)
Wall Aquarium 3x2 (Animated)
Underwater Cave 3x2 (Free Movement)
Cave Terrarium (Animated)
Penguin Habitat (Animated)
Swamp Terrarium (Free Movement)
Beaver Habitat (Free Movement)
Quetzal Habitat (Free Movement)
Wyvern Habitat (Free Movement)
Beehive Habitat (Animated)
Monkey Temple (Animated)
Otter Habitat (Free Movement)
Fertile Biome Habitat (Free Movement)
Bio Luminescent Habitat (Free Movement)
Elements Habitat (Free Movement)


[url=https://www.patreon.com/ecoModsGames][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/5ibmqtqm1/patreon.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://discord.gg/8C3GUFt][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/c5men4b6x/Discord.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://logicservers.com/?promo=Eco][img]https://s22.postimg.cc/ehjqv7s7l/logicservers-banner.png[/img][/url]

Server Hosting Provided by [url=https://logicservers.com/?promo=Eco]LogicServers[/url]
[b]Use promo code eco for 20% off[/b]
I receive NO payment from this company I just really like them :)


[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/57h5b1o0p/terrariums_install.png][/img]

[h1][b]Having issues installing or updating a mod?[/b][/h1]
[url=https://www.bluefangsolutions.com/adding-mods-to-your-ark-game-server/]Installing/Updating Mods Tutorial[/url] - Text instructions
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h6MmSoZdRA8]Installing/Updating Mods Tutorial[/url] - Video instructions

[h1][b]MOD ID: 880887081[/b][/h1]

[h1][b]Missing items?[/b][/h1]
If you updated the mod and are missing items then your install is probably corrupt. You must follow the instructions [b][u]specifically[/u][/b] for your server host.

[h1][b]Can't place items or find the Landscape Crafting Table engram?[/b][/h1]
If you can't place an item from this mod then your server probably hasn't updated with the latest version. If you can't find the engram make sure the mod is copied over to the server completely and the mod ID is listed under active mods. 

[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/6mipzsrop/terrariums_mods.png][/img]
